Authenticate a user by validating the user's password, returning a Subject with one or more Principals set (if validation was successful), or throw a LoginException (if validation fails)

O

org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.loginmodules.password.common - package org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.loginmodules.password.common
Provides common classes for a username / password style JAAS modules, such as a login module, common interfaces, and default implementations.
